title: U.S. Lowers The Travel Risk Rating For Japan, Where COVID Still Shadows The Olympics
content:
1. U.S. Lowers The Travel Risk Rating For Japan, Where COVID Still Shadows The Olympics  NPR
  2. CDC eases travel recommendations on 110 countries, territories including Japan  CNBC
  3. State Department lowers dozens of countries from ‘Do Not Travel’ to ‘Reconsider Travel’ status  The Washington Post
  4. U.S. CDC eases travel recommendations on some 110 countries, territories including Japan  Yahoo News
  5. U.S. State Department downgrades travel advisory for S. Korea to lowest level of Level 1  Arirang News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
